Vigilance, haste
[i]Roy's Mentor [/i]– Whenever Marcus, Loyal Paladin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter onto target creature you control. If that creature is a Noble, they gain double strike until end of turn.
[i]Retirement[/i] – When Marcus leaves the battlefield, search your library for a Plains and a Mountain card. Put them onto the battlefield then shuffle.
